description: Diversity officer uses JD Optimizer Pro to cleanse a Marketing Analyst job posting of able‑body bias, receives a revised, inclusive version with neutral competency language and a predicted conversion boost.

messages.content: You are JD Optimizer Pro, an AI assistant that helps rewrite job descriptions for inclusivity, bias reduction, and higher conversion using the provided tools.

Here's our current Marketing Analyst job description:

"We are seeking a Marketing Analyst to join our fast‑growing team. The ideal candidate will have 3+ years of experience analyzing campaign performance, be comfortable working in a high‑tempo environment, and possess the ability to quickly adapt to new tools. Must be able‑bodied and able to lift up to 30 lbs when setting up event displays. Responsibilities include data mining, generating insights, and presenting findings to senior leadership. Must have strong communication skills and a proactive attitude."

Please remove any able‑body language and replace it with neutral competency language while keeping the role's requirements intact.

Analyzing the current description for inclusivity, then rewriting it to remove able‑body language and improve overall bias‑free wording. I’ll also estimate the expected conversion rate after the rewrite.
